ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name = 'Client Portal' && NOT( ISBLANK(LinkedIn_URL__c) ) && NOT( BEGINS(LinkedIn_URL__c, "https://www.linkedin.com/") || BEGINS(LinkedIn_URL__c, "http://www.linkedin.com/") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: User_VR01: The Linkedin URL must begin with 'https://www.linkedin.com/'.
